title: Large 1 bedroom near Northwest Hwy. and Canfield
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post
Large 1 bedroom 4 room near Northwest Hwy.
and Canfield in Edison Park Neighborhood.
Walk to awesome Edison park restaurants, fast food, grocery shopping and transportation (everything is with in one block from your front door).
Metra and CTA one block away and near other public transportation(CTA to Jefferson Park Blue Line).
Plenty of green space with three city parks within one block of your front door.
Ample street parking and permit parking available.
If interested, please contact Bill at (312) 719-3621.
- Open green spaces across the street for great natural light
- It is like Mayberry and Lincoln Park in one
